data.title: Elastic names former McAfee executive Kulkarni as CEO, replacing co-founder Banon; stock drops
data.description: Elastic shares dropped in December on weak earnings, and the stock got caught up in a sell-off of cloud names in recent weeks.

data.title: Despite higher wages, inflation gave the average worker a 2.4% pay cut last year
data.description: Higher consumer prices in 2021 erased the raises many workers got from their employers. However, wage growth outstripped inflation for some lower earners.

data.title: Biden says inflation report shows progress in slowing down runaway prices
data.description: President Joe Biden on Wednesday touted the latest consumer inflation report as evidence that price jumps have started to slow.

data.title: If prices keep rising, a nightmare scenario for the US economy is a real possibility
data.description: There's no denying it: Inflation is here. Consumer prices surged 7% over the past year. Housing prices have continued to soar, too. But the question on the minds of many economists and Wall Street strategists is whether something even worse could be in the cards: prices rising as the economy slows.

data.title: Messy job reports and unreliable labor data forecasts take a toll on Biden in his first year
data.description: In 2021, the Labor Department's initial monthly jobs report and Wall Street's estimates have been less reliable — and President Biden paid the political price.

data.title: Here’s how rising inflation may affect your 2021 tax bill
data.description: Inflation is still rising, and while many notice the surge in day-to-day expenses, climbing prices may also affect your tax bill, experts say.

data.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: DoorDash, Biogen, T. Rowe Price, Crocs and more
data.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

data.title: There's a growing push in Congress to limit lawmakers' ability to trade stocks
data.description: Congress often talks tough about reining in Wall Street. But now there's growing pressure on Capitol Hill to curb lawmakers' own trading.

data.title: Meat is finally getting cheaper. But these other foods aren't
data.description: Good news: After rising for months, meat prices are finally falling at the grocery store. Bad news: Many other staples are getting more expensive.

data.title: This is the worst inflation in nearly 40 years. But it was so much worse back then
data.description: US prices for just about everything -- from cars and gasoline to food and clothing -- are rising at the fastest pace in decades.
